Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

details.description: Additional information that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition in a human-readable form.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

FeeLineItem.description: Fee details for a specific fee.

feeType.description: The type of fee charged to the seller.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The FBA per-order fulfillment fee (order handling).

FeePreview.description: The fee estimate for a specific item.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) value used to identify the item.

feeBreakdown.description: A list of the Small and Light fees for the item.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) value used to identify the item.

currencyCode.description: The currency code in ISO 4217 format.

SellerSKU.description: Identifies an item in the given marketplace. SellerSKU is qualified by the seller's SellerId, which is included with every operation that you submit.

SmallAndLightEligibility.description: The Small and Light eligibility status of the item indicated by the specified seller SKU.

SmallAndLightEligibilityStatus.description: The Small and Light eligibility status of the item.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The Small and Light eligibility status is eligible.
The Small and Light eligibility status is not eligible.

SmallAndLightEnrollment.description: The Small and Light enrollment status of the item indicated by the specified seller SKU.

SmallAndLightEnrollmentStatus.description: The Small and Light enrollment status of the item.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The Small and Light enrollment status is enrolled.
The Small and Light enrollment status is not enrolled.

SmallAndLightFeePreviewRequest.description: Request schema for submitting items for which to retrieve fee estimates.

items.description: A list of items for which to retrieve fee estimates (limit: 25).

data.description: A list of fee estimates for the requested items. The order of the fee estimates will follow the same order as the items in the request, with duplicates removed.

info.description: The Selling Partner API for FBA Small and Light lets you help sellers manage their listings in the Small and Light program. The program reduces the cost of fulfilling orders for small and lightweight FBA inventory. You can enroll or remove items from the program and check item eligibility and enrollment status. You can also preview the estimated program fees charged to a seller for items sold while enrolled in the program.
info.title: Selling Partner API for FBA Small And Light

get.description:
Returns the Small and Light program eligibility status of the item indicated by the specified seller SKU in the specified marketplace. If the item is not eligible, the ineligibility reasons are returned.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 2 | 10 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

parameters.description: The seller SKU that identifies the item.
parameters.name: sellerSKU

parameters.description: The marketplace for which the eligibility status is retrieved. NOTE: Accepts a single marketplace only.
parameters.name: marketplaceIds

delete.description:
Removes the item indicated by the specified seller SKU from the Small and Light program in the specified marketplace. If the item is not eligible for disenrollment, the ineligibility reasons are returned.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 2 | 5 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

parameters.description: The seller SKU that identifies the item.
parameters.name: sellerSKU

parameters.description: The marketplace in which to remove the item from the Small and Light program. Note: Accepts a single marketplace only.
parameters.name: marketplaceIds

put.description:
Enrolls the item indicated by the specified seller SKU in the Small and Light program in the specified marketplace. If the item is not eligible, the ineligibility reasons are returned.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 2 | 5 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

parameters.name: sellerSKU

parameters.description: The marketplace in which to enroll the item. Note: Accepts a single marketplace only.
parameters.name: marketplaceIds

post.description:
Returns the Small and Light fee estimates for the specified items. You must include a marketplaceId parameter to retrieve the proper fee estimates for items to be sold in that marketplace. The ordering of items in the response will mirror the order of the items in the request. Duplicate ASIN/price combinations are removed.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 1 | 3 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.
